mapper.select: select sum(real_watch_num)/sum(should_watch_num) rate from video where time >= #{beginTime} and time < #{endTime} ;

select course_name, sum(real_watch_num)/sum(should_watch_num) rate from video, course, classes, grade where video.course_id = course.course_id and video.classes_id = classes.classes_id and classes.grade_id = grade.grade_id and grade.grade_id = #{gradeId} GROUP BY course.course_name
